availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Williamson Sr. (Caldwell co., ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Eliza Williamson. Father of George Williamson, Nancy Williamson, James Williamson, Sarah L. Williamson, Alfred Williamson, Mary Williamson, Thomas Williamson, Horace Williamson, Robert Williamson Jr., and Kelly Williamson. Resident in Wilson County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Farmersville, Kentucky, in 1860

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Wilson County, District 14, p. 552A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Farmersville, p. 138.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administration Bonds, 1863-1878, p. 251.
